title: 这是王老师，这是我爸爸。
description:
zhè shì wáng lǎoshī zhè shì wǒ bàba
This is teacher Wang, this is my father.

title: 王老师，您好！
description:
wáng lǎoshī nín hǎo
Teacher Wang, hello!

title: 您好！请进！请坐！请喝茶！
description:
nín hǎo qǐng jìn qǐng zuò qǐng hē chá
Hello!Please come in! Have a seat! Have some tea!

title: 工作忙吗？
description:
gōngzuò máng ma
Is your work busy?

title: 身体好吗？
description:
shēntǐ hǎo ma
How is your health?
